articles.author: Maggie Harrison Dupré
articles.title: Turns Out That Extremely Impressive Sora Demo... Wasn't Exactly Made With Sora - Futurism
articles.description: A viral two-minute short titled "Air Head," created in part by using OpenAI's video-generating Sora tool, required a good bit human editing.
articles.content:
Once again, tech demos are giving us trust issues.
